term.title: lethal dose

item.text: Amount of a substance or physical agent (radiation) that causes death when taken into the body by a single absorption (denoted by LD).

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2003. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in toxicology (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2063 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365092003)
